name: Supernova
storyline:
Dash through procedurally-generated levels with destructible obstacles and blast apart enemies with upgradable weapons in this EDM-themed runner/FPS hybrid!

Unlock the next levels by beating bosses, but watch out for new obstacles and faster speeds as you progress through the game. After completing 10 levels, a final boss appears and killing the final boss completes the run. An online leaderboard is included to display your high score in comparison to others.
summary: Dash through procedurally-generated levels with destructible obstacles and blast apart enemies with upgradable weapons in this EDM-themed runner/FPS hybrid!
